title: Italy: the land and the people
brief_description: This film depicts the agriculture, industry, and principle cities and culture of Italy, from the fertile Po Valley in the north, south along the Apennines and adjacent coastal land to the islands of Sicily and Sardinia. Emphasises new industrial growth in the sixties and participation in the European community.
